message: Let's start fair. 50/50 split seems like a good way to begin.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55/45 is still quite fair.
I think we both need to be more flexible here. Let's go back to a 50/50 split. Time is running out, and I don't want us to lose everything.
I see you're getting anxious, but I still think I can get a better deal. 57/43 is my new offer.
We're losing money with every round. Let's compromise a little. 48 for me, 52 for you. That's a better deal for both of us than losing everything!
You're getting desperate, I can see. I'll take 60, you can have 40. It's better than nothing, right?
I'm willing to concede a bit more, but I'm not going to give in completely.  45 for me, 55 for you. This is my final offer.
